show_name: Cute High Earth Defense Club LOVE! LOVE! (TV)
other_title: Binan Kōkō Chikyū Bōei-bu Love! Love! (Japanese)
plot: With things a bit calmer since the whole Zundar fiasco, the boys can get back to what’s important in life -- like hanging around the bathhouse and being lazy. But when the Loveracelets start calling, they’ll have to jump back into the action.
opening_theme: "Futten Toppa LOVE IS POWER" (沸点突破☆LOVE IS POWER☆; Past the Boiling Point Love Is Power) by Chikyū Bōei-bu
ending_theme: "Anata wa Haruka Ittōsei" (あなたは遥か一等星; You Are a Distant First Magnitude Star) by VEPPer
